favorites.content: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
favorites.author: Pema Chödrön

history.content: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope.
history.author: Anonymous

history.content: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
history.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

history.content: All I required to be happy was friendship and people I could admire.
history.author: Christian Dior

history.content: All know the way; few actually walk it.
history.author: Bodhidharma

history.content: Never say there is nothing beautiful in the world anymore. There is always something to make you wonder in the shape of a tree, the trembling of a leaf.
history.author: Albert Schweitzer

history.content: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
history.author: Jim Rohn

history.content: Nothing in life is so exhilarating as to be shot at without result.
history.author: Winston Churchill

history.content: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
history.author: Kahlil Gibran

history.content: Friendships are the family we make - not the one we inherit. I've always been someone to whom friendship, elective affinities, is as important as family.
history.author: Salman Rushdie

history.content: Better be ignorant of a matter than half know it.
history.author: Publilius Syrus

history.content: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
history.author: Albert Schweitzer

history.content: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
history.author: Janis Joplin

history.content: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
history.author: David Brinkley

history.content: Experience is not what happens to a man. It is what a man does with what happens to him.
history.author: Aldous Huxley

history.content: A friend is, as it were, a second self.
history.author: Cicero

history.content: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
history.author: Bernard Shaw

history.content: The things that one most wants to do are the things that are probably most worth doing.
history.author: Winifred Holtby

history.content: Do not scorn what you have received, nor envy the gains of others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
history.author: The Buddha

history.content: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.
history.author: Simon Sinek

history.content: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution.
history.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

history.content: Much wisdom often goes with fewest words.
history.author: Sophocles

history.content: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
history.author: Epictetus

history.content: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
history.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

history.content: If you seek truth, you will not seek victory by dishonorable means, and if you find truth you will become invincible.
history.author: Epictetus

history.content: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
history.author: Dr. Seuss

history.content: Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
history.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

history.content: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
history.author: Dalai Lama

history.content: That's the risk you take if you change: that people you've been involved with won't like the new you. But other people who do will come along.
history.author: Lisa Alther

history.content: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
history.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.content: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.content: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs
